sentences.sContent: These spices were first brought to Italy from the East in medieval times.
sentences.sCn: 这些香料最早是在中世纪时从东方被带到了意大利。

synos.tran: 中世纪的；原始的；仿中世纪的；老式的

remMethod.val: medi (中间) + ev (时间) + al (的) → 中世纪的

trans.tranCn: 中世纪的， 仿中世纪的； 老式的， 原始的
trans.tranOther: connected with the Middle Ages (= the period between about 1100 and 1500 AD )
